Gleanings and expositions of some, and but some of the more difficult places of scriptures: perhaps, but the first-fruits unto a more plentifull harvest / by John Lavvson. Lawson, John, fl. 1644-1646.
[6], 72 p.
Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Nath. Webb and Will. Grantham, at the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1646.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 18th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
